title: Happy Bar and Restaurant
typeOfFood: International, Thai, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu has a veg sandwiches section which includes a grilled tofu sandwich and a portobello burger. Fruit smoothies are vegan. Kitchen can cook something vegan to-order, such as Thai curries with tofu. Reported the owner understands vegetarian and vegan diets and is able to adapt dishes on the menu to suit. Family-friendly atmosphere, including high chairs and children's meals.
